info.name: EUDAT Switchboard bridge
info.summary: The Switchboard bridge sends a file from B2DROP to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard.
info.description: This nextcloud plugin allows users to directly send files from their personal cloud store to the CLARIN Language Resource Switchboard. The user interface of B2DROP is extended with a icon to transfer files. Once transferred, a new browser tab opens with the switchboard app. From there, the file can be processed by a number of different language-related processing tools.
info.author: CLARIN-PLUS/EUDAT
